amendment.description: To increase funding for emergency management performance grants.

action.text: Amendment SA 1327 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1327 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 293.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1327.
Amendment SA 1327 proposed by Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S9753-9755, S9756; text: CR S9753) To increase funding for emergency management performance grants.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1327 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 293.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1327 proposed by Senator Murray.
